sen.j: 土師千島（はじのちしま、生没年不明）は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: HAJI no Chishima (year of birth and death unknown) was one historical figure in the Asuka Period.
HAJI no Chishima (year of birth and death unknown) was a person from the Asuka Period in Japan.
sen.cmt: one historiacl figure in -> a person from
sen.e: HAJI no Chishima (year of birth and death unknown) was a person from the Asuka Period in Japan.

sen.j: 旧仮名遣いでの読みは同じ。
sen.e: In the old Japanese syllabary characters way of reading, it was read the same way.
In the old Japanese syllabary characters, his name was pronounced in the same way.
In the old Japanese syllabary characters, his name was pronounced in the same way.

sen.j: 天武天皇元年（672年）の壬申の乱で大友皇子（弘文天皇）側につき、7月13日に近江国の安河の浜で敗れて捕らえられた。
sen.e: Although, having taken sides with Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun) at the Jinshin War in 672, HAJI was defeated in battle and fell into enemy hands at Yasukawa no Hama in Omi Province (coast side of Omi province).
As HAJI fought for Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun) in the Jinshin War which broke out in 672, he was defeated and captured at Yasukawa no Hama in Omi Province (coast side of Omi province).
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: As HAJI fought for Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun) in the Jinshin War which broke out in 672, he was defeated and captured at Yasukawa no Hama in Omi Province (coast side of Omi province) in August 14, 672.
sen.cmt: 年月日が漏れていたので補足しました。

sen.j: 土師氏は壬申の乱で同族が敵味方に分かれて戦った。
sen.e: Since some members of the HAJI family took the enemy's side, they had to fight with each other at the Jinshin War.
During the Jinshin War, Haji clan fought among themselves for some took the side of Prince Otomo and others Prince Oama (later Emperor Tenmu, the enemy).
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: During the Jinshin War, Haji clan fought among themselves for some took the side of Prince Otomo and others Prince Oama (later Emperor Tenmu, the enemy).

sen.j: 土師千島については他に知られず、捕らえられてからどうなったかも不明である。
sen.e: Further information about HAJI and even after his capture is still not clear.
Further information about HAJI including what happened after being captured is unknown.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: Further information about HAJI including what happened after being captured is unknown.
